document_data.mainbody:
arkess Lanys was one of the founding members of the Knights of the Sword Coast during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Barkess founded the Knights of the Sword Coast with his close friend Vhonna Deepdell in the . Their goal was to rid the Sword Coast of evil whenever they came across it during their travels. Barkess remained with the Knights until his death in the .
